text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) zeroclaw-labs/zeroclaw | 96% | stars now 4681 → est 19784 (range 19759-19809)
   https://github.com/zeroclaw-labs/zeroclaw
2) sipeed/picoclaw | 96% | stars now 11711 → est 21235 (range 21175-21295)
   https://github.com/sipeed/picoclaw
3) bwya77/vscode-dark-islands | 93% | stars now 1275 → est 6916 (range 6891-6941)
   https://github.com/bwya77/vscode-dark-islands
4) PeonPing/peon-ping | 93% | stars now 2150 → est 5340 (range 5315-5365)
   https://github.com/PeonPing/peon-ping
5) The-Vibe-Company/companion | 92% | stars now 1877 → est 3833 (range 3808-3858)
   https://github.com/The-Vibe-Company/companion

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
